participant_1.background:
I spend time with my grandson on Saturdays and read about pet training.
I want to use my passion for God to inspire others.
My first purchase was a pair of shoes to fit my growing feet.
i will graduate from college in two years.
i m a simple man.

participant_2.background:
I often find myself getting distracted by social media when I should be working.
I enjoy spending time with my grandparents and hearing about their stories.
My family and I are close because we are all in on the joke.
I can work from home and still make enough money to provide for my family.
My favorite book is a collection of spooky Halloween stories.

content.text: Hi! How are you doing today?
I am doing well, thank you for asking! Just getting started on my day.
Same here! I have a lot of work to do today, but I am excited about it.
What kind of work do you do?
I am a writer, and I am currently working on a story about a family of ghosts.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love reading spooky stories.
Me too! I am always looking for new books to read.
I have a lot of favorite books, but my favorite is probably "The Haunting of Hill House" by Shirley Jackson.
I have heard good things about that book. I will have to check it out.
It is a great book! You will definitely enjoy it.
